title: North Meck upsets Vance, in position to win Mecka
text:

The Vikings have won seven of their last eight games. WCNC.com: http://www.wcnc.com/story/sports/high-school/2015/10/24/north-meck-upsets-vance-in-position-to-win-mecka/74527114/   Join the Conversation To   North Meck upsets Vance, in position to win Mecka North Meck upset conference foe Vance 20-14. WCNC WCNC 11:04 a.m. EDT October 24, 2015 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
HUNTERSVILLE, N.C. â€“ Maybe the biggest turnaround in the state belongs to Brad Baker's North Meck Vikings. 
The Vikings put everyone in the state on notice Friday night, upsetting Vance 20-14, putting themselves in the driver's seat for a potential conference championship. The Vikings have won seven of their last eight games. 
North Meck quarterback Kendall Coles was efficient, completing seven of 11 passes with a touchdown. He also carried the ball 11 times for 49 yards and the game-winning score. 
Next week Baker's team will host Hough next week before wrapping up the regular season against Mallard Creek. Read or Share this story: http://www.wcnc.com/story/sports/high-school/2015/10/24/north-meck-upsets-vance-in-position-to-win-mecka/74527114/ TOP VIDEOS
